name: Wordy (bogarttyyy)
description:
This is an attempt to clone wordscape, which turned more into text twist (if any one remembers that?)

It took a day just for the super basic prototype, then a few days just to get over the hurdle of making custom input (instead of just an input field).

Learned to add sound
Learned to make (ugly) text sprites
Learned to load a file using UnityWebRequests

BUT! Is this a finished project? Absolutely not!
It's more of a "What can I make?"

This is just to test out my skills in game development. Will probably update if I can think of things to add to this project.

For now, unto the next!
